Welcome to Tales of the Dice ğŸ‘‹ğŸ¾

I started playing tabletop role playing games (TTRPGs) a couple of years back, especially since I discovered Shawn Tomkinâ€™sÂ Ironsworn TTRPG. I loved the versatility and the play-to-see-what happens mechanics. 

Mostly, I play Solo RPGs â€“ meaning Iâ€™ll be playing these games alone. This site is an attempt to convert my gameplays into a quasi-narrative style.

I will be playing Shawn Tomkinâ€™sÂ Ironsworn and its variants:
* [Ironsworn](https://tomkinpress.com/pages/ironsworn)Â - the base game
* [Ironsworn:Starforged](https://tomkinpress.com/pages/ironsworn-starforged) - a standalone, sci-fi evolution of the Ironsworn RPG
* [Sundered Isles](https://tomkinpress.com/pages/sundered-isles) - a seafaring expansion for Ironsworn: Starforged
